p: The PRISMA flow diagram was prepared using PRISMA2020: R package and ShinyApp for producing PRISMA 2020 compliant flow diagrams (Version 0.0.1) [ 15]. The world map was created using the rworldmap package (version 1.3-6) [ 16] in RStudio (version 1.3.1093) [ 17] with R 4.0.3 [ 18]. The graph of studies over time was also created in RStudio using ggplot2 (version 3.3.3) [ 19].
